page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content: This block of the Doomesday Survey was completed by three schools in the Worsbrough area,Worsbrough High School Worsbrough St.Marys Junior and Infant School and Ward Green Junior School. Work from Worsbrough High was by;Miss Pollard,M.Dainty,K.Ryan,G.Woodward,J. Tinkler,J.Bland,T.Remmington,K.Watson J.Standish,S.Scaife,P.Burton,C.Hunt and D.Hall.Coordinator Mrs.P.Lees. St.Marys work was produced by Mr.Thornton and children of class 3. Ward Green Work was completed by children of class 5.Text pages by I.Harwick,A.Wortley,R.Jackson, R.Grummitt,L.Clarke,L.Cooling,L.Scaife C.Hartley and V.Askin. The whole project was coordinated by Mr.J.H Wright.Thanks to all who have been involved with the work and to those whohave spared the time for interviews.
